name: rapscallion
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person, especially a child or a man, who is dishonest or causes trouble, but who you often still like: She got a rare interview with the lovable, rock-and-roll rapscallion. He portrays the character as an endearing rapscallion.
More examplesFewer examplesThey first meet through her rapscallion brother, Max. He was 10 years old when he and some fellow rapscallions cheekily knocked on the footballer's door. The rapscallion has neglected to mention a few important facts about his past.
